meta.label: Custom dataset kayrros_retrieve-dataset
meta.description: Retrieve your dataset from the Kayrros API

params.name: username
params.label: Email
params.description: The email you use to connect to the Kayrros instance

params.name: password
params.label: Password
params.description: The password you use to connect to the Kayrros instance

params.name: collection_id
params.label: Choose your collection
params.description: The collection you want to retrieve from Kayrros

params.name: dataset_id
params.label: Choose your dataset
params.description: The specific dataset inside of that collection
